overview:
Mark Dittman has more than 25 years of financial technology experience. Dittman is focused on steering the companyâ€™s roll in the financial services industry, while maximizing performance. As CEO, Dittman has maintained a tremendous growth rate of over 20% year over year.

Mr. Dittman is responsible for developing strategic partnerships, architecting merger and acquisition opportunities, and marketing oversight. He has played a critical role in the successful acquisition of MICR Resource Management and two divisions of Goldleaf Financial Solutions.
